name: Downpour
content: Hiding from the ghost of yesterday
I I wanna feel the rain again
我 我想要再次感受大雨
I I wanna feel the water on my skin
我 我想触摸身上的水珠
让它在倾盆大雨中流走
I wanna feel the rain feel the rain
我想要感受大雨 感受大雨
I still can't face the sun
I I wanna feel the rain again
我 我想要再次感受大雨
And I I wanna feel the water on my skin
我 我想触摸身上的水珠
让它在倾盆大雨中流走
I wanna feel the rain feel the rain
我想要感受大雨 感受大雨
I thought you were the only one girl
女孩 你是我的唯一
Now I think I was wrong
Oh I I wanna feel the rain again
哦我 我想要再次感受大雨
I I wanna feel the water on my skin
我 我想触摸身上的水珠
让它在倾盆大雨中流走
I I wanna feel the rain again
我 我想要再次感受大雨
I I wanna feel the water on my skin
我 我想触摸身上的水珠
让它在倾盆大雨中流走
倾盆大雨 感受大雨
